BadgeDetail.Name: Product Development
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they can articulate the need of their product via a problem statement the product solves. They understand the minimum viable product required at launch and produce a roadmap for future features.

Task.Title: Prototype
Task.Body: Upload a prototype demonstrating your product or service. This could be a link to a video of the prototype product or a slideshow showing the end to end process for a service. Include any assets that support your product.
